templates.title: RomM
templates.description: Scan, enrich, and browse your game collection with a clean and responsive interface. With support for multiple platforms, various naming schemes and custom tags, RomM is a must-have for anyone who plays on emulators.
templates.name: romm
templates.note: The RomM Project on GitHub
